components.hint:
Your landlord has a responsibility to make sure that plumbing and drainage is working properly.

It is not always clear who is responsible for water damage associated with leaks, especially if the leak is coming from a neighbouring property.  

Select all that apply.

items.label: Water is coming in to the property from  outside
items.name: auto_name__27

components.legend: Water leak (inside or outside), sinks, baths, toilets, pipes and drains

sectionHeading: What is the problem with your housing?
